name: RITBusApp
0:
”Alexa ask R.I.T. Bus when is the next bus coming?”
”When will the next bus be here?”
”How long until the next bus gets here?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: r. i. t. bus
des: Find out when the next RIT bus will arrive. If the bus isn't running, the app will let you know. The bus runs during the day on weekdays.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
